inputDefs.description: 音色ID，默认为爽快思思/Skye。详细音色列表参考 https://bytedance.larkoffice.com/docx/WdDOdiB1BoRyBNxlkXWcn0n3nLc, default value is 爽快思思/Skye
inputDefs.name: speaker_id

inputDefs.description: 语速，范围是[0.2,3]，默认为1，通常保留一位小数即可, default value is 1
inputDefs.name: speed_ratio

inputDefs.description: 要合成音频的文本内容
